name: Faerie Trap
description: places a faerie trap at your feet which explodes when an enemy approaches it dealing 67 + 67% Weapon Damage as Nature Damage./n/nLines all enemies damaged with Faerie Fire, increasing their chance to be Critically Hit by 8% and preventing them from entering Stealth for 30 seconds.\n\nAdditionally a Barrier is applied to you for each enemy damaged./n/nTrap will exist for 60 seconds.
